name: vueport
title: VuePort: Let the Light in!
description:
Using Handlebars is like switching from Theatre of the Mind to using a ruler to help tracing your grid in your pen & paper game. Using Vue is like switching to Foundry VTT instead!

Open the VuePort, let the light in and bask in the glory!

This library module, contributed by The Forge, provides an easy way to integrate Vue.js within your Foundry applications. See README for details on how to use it.
